column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////I wish I didn't have this place on speed dial
column2: but here we are. I probably eat here (or do takeout) at least once a week. I recommend the Brussels sprouts (so good) or the tonkotsu spicy. I usually go for the hottest level and it definitely holds its own. BUT
column3: if you are a total badass
column4: you can always try it diablo style (NOT advertised and NOT for the faint of heart - I'm serious). The restaurant is not very family friendly
column5: but they do offer takeout which is fairly uncommon for ramen places. Out of the 50+ times I've gotten take out
column6: they have never once got my order incorrect.
